trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Montreal
There were no other sightings in Montreal on or around September 17th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking with my dog in a street near my house in DDO. I watched the planet Jupiter around 45 azimuth SE when I saw three small rounded objects with similar dimension ( angular ) of Jupiter, however less brighter and with orange color. I saw them during 5-10 seconds moving from W to E in a trajectory similar to a shooting star, however, there was not coma or trajectory traces. No noise happened. Suddenly one of them moved around the other (could be due to perspective view ) and them they disappear probable entering in the Sun shadow cone around 45 azimuth. The sky was clear in that point, despite of some clouds nearby. Could be a rest of some satellite or rocket, however, the movement around the other was strange for me.
Summary: Three star-like objects moving over Montreal
